skill_constraints: Single point of failure for CI/CD implementation (DevOps Lead).
resource_bottlenecks: Review cycles for cross-domain tasks (e.g., Lead reviewing PromQL).
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize cross-training and pair programming on critical tasks.

skill_constraints: No buffer for learning or unexpected complexity. High context-switching overhead.
resource_bottlenecks: Both resources become bottlenecks as there is no slack capacity.
mitigation_strategies: Defer 'Should Have' tasks to a later release. Reduce scope of non-critical dashboards.
